concept.title: Building EAR files
concept.shortdesc: Before deploying an application the application EAR files must be built on a platform that supports building of Cúram. For more information see Supported Prerequisites.

conbody.p: In summary, the building of application EAR files involves invoking the Ant server, client, EAR, and release targets on a supported build platform. See Building and configuring a Cúram application for more information to perform these builds.
